card.name: Grindstone
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. If two cards that share a color were milled this way, repeat this process.

card.name: Retrofitter Foundry
card.text: {3}: Untap Retrofitter Foundry.{2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.{T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

card.name: Sword of War and Peace
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from red and from white.Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, Sword of War and Peace deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in their hand and you gain 1 life for each card in your hand.Equip {2}
